00002 !  ===============================================================
00003 !
00004 !                           PMOVE
00005 !
00006 !   Update particle positions - used with leap-frog scheme
00007 !
00008 !  ===============================================================
00009 
00010 subroutine push(ips,ipf,delt)
00011 
00012   use physvars
00013   use treevars
00014   integer, intent(in) :: ips, ipf  ! 1st and last particle numbers
00015   real, intent(in) :: delt
00016   integer :: i,p
00017   real :: gamma
00018 
00019   !  relativistic particle push in space
00020 
00021   do p=ips,ipf
00022      gamma = sqrt(1.0 + ux(p)**2 + uy(p)**2 + uz(p)**2)
00023 !     gamma = 1.0
00024      x(p)=x(p)+ux(p)/gamma*delt
00025      y(p)=y(p)+uy(p)/gamma*delt
00026      z(p)=z(p)+uz(p)/gamma*delt
00027 
00028   end do
00029 
00030 end subroutine push
